perturbation.original_text:
5.1 ADVERTISING FEES.  After the Launch Date,
i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based
on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising
fees shall consist of a per Transaction Inquiry
amount calculated by multiplying 0.025% by
the amount of the average Transaction from
all Customers in the preceding quarter. The
formula for arriving at the per Transaction
Inquiry amount may be revised from time to
time during the term of this Agreement to
reflect present market conditions ("the
Adjusted Rate"), but only by mutual
consent of the parties after good faith discussions.
The Adjusted Rate shall be added as an
addendum to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1 ADVERTISING FEES.  After the Launch Date,
i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based
on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising
fees shall consist of a per Transaction Inquiry
amount calculated by multiplying 0.025% by
the amount of the average Transaction from
all Customers in the preceding quarter. The
formula for arriving at the per Transaction
Inquiry amount will be revised every quarter, automatically, to reflect present market conditions ("the
Adjusted Rate"). The Adjusted Rate shall be added as an
addendum to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction regarding the modification of the advertising fee calculation. Originally, it required mutual consent for revision, but now it states that it will be automatically revised every quarter. This creates uncertainty and potential disputes over how the advertising fees are calculated and adjusted.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue for
one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier
terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be
renewed for any number of successive one (1)
year terms by mutual written agreement of
the parties prior to the conclusion of the
term of this Agreement.  A party wishing to
renew this Agreement shall give the other
party notice thereof no less than thirty
(30) days before the expiration of the term
then in effect.  In the event that either
party does not give such notice, the term of
this Agreement shall be automatically
renewed for another one (1) year.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue for
one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier
terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be
renewed for any number of successive one (1)
year terms by mutual written agreement of
the parties prior to the conclusion of the
term of this Agreement.  A party wishing to
renew this Agreement shall give the other
party notice thereof no less than thirty
(30) days before the expiration of the term
then in effect.  In the event that either
party does not give such notice, the term of
this Agreement shall NOT be automatically
renewed for another one (1) year, unless explicitly stated in writing by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a direct contradiction regarding the automatic renewal of the agreement. The original clause states that the agreement automatically renews if no notice is given, while the modified clause negates this automatic renewal and requires an explicit written agreement by both parties. This creates uncertainty about the renewal process and could lead to disputes about the agreement's term.

perturbation.original_text:
12.6 NOTICE.  Any notices hereunder shall be given to the
appropriate party at the address specified below or at such other
address as the party shall specify in writing.  Notice shall
be deemed given: upon personal delivery余 if sent by fax, upon
confirmation of receipt余 or if sent by a reputable overnight
courier with tracking capabilities, one (1) day after the date of
mailing:
perturbation.changed_text:
12.6 NOTICE.  Any notices hereunder shall be given to the
appropriate party at the address specified below or at such other
address as the party shall specify in writing.  Notice shall
be deemed given: upon personal delivery余 if sent by fax, three (3) days after confirmation of receipt余 or if sent by a reputable overnight
courier with tracking capabilities, one (1) day after the date of
mailing:
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that notice is deemed given upon confirmation of receipt via fax. The changed clause now states that notice is deemed given three (3) days *after* confirmation of receipt via fax. This creates a contradiction in the notification timeline and uncertainty about when a notice is legally considered received, potentially impacting deadlines and obligations.
